ygData.subject: RE: Some praise and a few questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From the EQ Glossary (http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqglossary.htm) toon - (n.) [Possibly a European term, from cartoons like Roger Rabbit who keep
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:24 AM 2/4/00 -0800, you wrote:
>From: John Tatsukawa <jht@...>
>
> > 2. My other toon is a mage(20th Level) and he is now in
> > OOT soloing gargoyles. Can I do the same with my bard or will
> > the gargoyles rip me a new one?
>
>"toon"? :-)


From the EQ Glossary (http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqglossary.htm)
"toon - (n.) [Possibly a European term, from cartoons like "Roger Rabbit"
who keep coming back every time they 'die'. More probably originated on
Sierra's original online world, The Realm. The characters in the game,
while highly customizable, were very cartoonish - thus, the reference to
"toons."] Any Player Character. e.g. "Ya, I just started this new toon
tonight.""

Talies the Wanderer
